侭字的基本解释

侭
（儘）
jǐn
同“尽2”。

侭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jǐn］
子忍切］
“侭1”的繁体字。亦作“盡2”。
(1)完全；都。
(2)最。
(3)表示以某个范围为限，不得超过。
(4)尽管；虽然。
(5)一任；听凭。
(6)一味；老是。
(7)尽先。让某些人或事物占先。
(8)甚；很。
(9)倒，却；竟然。
(10)尽可，足可。
(11)谓力求达到最大限度。
(12)犹询问，征求。

侭字的康熙字典解释
侭字的源字形

字源演变：

楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
侭字的起名意思

暂无。

Idiot
Basic explanation of words
Idiot
(Exhausted)
jǐn
Same as "Exhaust 2".
Idiot
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jǐn］
Sub-nin cut]
Traditional characters for "侭1". Also called "Exhaustion 2".
(1) Complete; both.
(2) Most.
(3) It means that it is limited to a certain range and cannot be exceeded.
(4) Although; although.
(5) One term; leave it to.
(6) Blindly; always.
(7) First. Let certain people or things take precedence.
(8) Very; very.
(9) Fall, but; unexpectedly.
(10) As much as possible, enough.
(11) Said to strive to reach the maximum.
(12) Still inquiring, soliciting.
